primaryText: The store is one of the key features of Redux.
secondaryText: It is the object that will make the actions and reducers have a purpose and has more responsibilities than the other two:
features: Allows access to state via getState() method
Allows state to be updated via dispatch(action)
Handles unregistering of listeners via the function returned by subscribe(listener).
snippets: These are the snippets that I use to look when I work with a store in redux:
